original_title: Fatto di sangue fra due uomini per causa di una vedova. Si sospettano moventi politici
overview: In pre-World War II Sicily, just as the fascists come to power, two men fall in love with the same woman. The changes in their country's politics ultimately take all three on a journey across the ocean to New York City.
tagline: A story of love and revenge.
title: Blood Feud
